ISSUE.TITLE: Duplicate addresses display in billing address on one page checkout
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.20 Beta Steps to reproduce the problem: 1. Enable One page checkout 2. Add product to cart 3. Go to cart 4. Click on checkout 5. Add new billing address and click on continue 6. Now when you click on back button from shipping method, new address does not create (Bug 1) 7. Again if you click on continue and click back from shipping method, you will find two address created with same details (Bug 2).

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #3808 Fixed duplicate addresses when create new address
